text: EXECVE(2) Linux Programmer's Manual EXECVE(2) NAE execve - execute progran SNOPSTS #include cunistd.h> int execve(const char *filenane, char *const argv(], char *const envp[1); DESCRIPTION execve() executes the progran pointed to by filenane. Filenane must be either a binary executable, or a script starting with a Line of the form "#1 interpreter [arg]". In the latter case, the interpreter must be a valid pathnane for an executable which is not itself a script, which will be invoked as interpreter [arg] filename.
